title: A little bit about me:
desc: High-level rhythm dance game player (In The Groove, Pump It Up), playing since 2018.
Member of the Vancouver rhythm game community and Discord since its creation in 2019.
Canadian-born Chinese. Fluent in English, conversational Cantonese, and self-taught Korean.

title: Why am I developing?:
desc: I love striving for efficiency. Make things run better and faster!
Software, full-stack, anything. Just give me a challenge and I'll have fun!

title: Currently:
desc: Searching for co-operative work experience and fun project ideas!
Working on this website, learning and gaining experience with Next and React.
Computer Systems Technology diploma program, second-time student at BCIT.

title: Previously:
desc: Department Manager at Assi Market for three years, total tenure of six.
Four years of undergraduate studies in Electrical Engineering, Bachelor's program at BCIT.
